column1: #Text=Château d'Œx is a ski station in Switzerland near Gstaad and Montreux .
#Text=Château-d'Œx is a small village of approximately 3,500 inhabitants in the French -speaking part of Switzerland .

#Text=In recent years , Château-d'Œx has become increasingly popular among travelers primarily for the village 's incredibly authentic Swiss alpine feel , stunning natural surroundings , and quiet atmosphere .
#Text=The of Château-d'Œx has hourly trains to Montreux ( 1h ) and Zweisimmen ( 50min ) via Gstaad ( 30min ) in the Bernese Highlands .
#Text=The trip will take a bit longer if you happen to take a regional slow train .
#Text=The train is operated by GoldenPass Montreux-Bernese Oberland ( MOB ) Railway .
#Text=Some of the connections are panorama trains or old style ' classic ' trains which do not cost extra and are part of the regular timetable .

#Text=There is a bus to Col-des-Mosse from where it is possible to join Aigle via another bus to Le Sépey and a train to Aigle , however it is much easier and faster to take the longer route via train passing through Montreux .
#Text=Château-d'Œx is approximately a 2 hour drive from Geneva and a 1 hour and 15 minute drive to Bern .
#Text=While not directly accessible by a motorway , driving into Château-d'Œx is not difficult .
#Text=It can be accessed from three different directions .
#Text=The main road comes in from Spiez ( with access to the A6 motorway ) and Zweisimmen in the Bernese Highlands and goes on to Aigle ( with access to the A9 motorway ) near the border to Valais .
#Text=Another smaller road leads into the canton of Fribourg , to Gruyères and Bulle , where you can join the A12 motorway .
#Text=Château-d'Œx is small enough that walking is the easiest and most efficient method of transportation to get anywhere in the village .
#Text=Château-d'Œx is hilly , however , so any walk may involve a steep hike at one point or another .
#Text=Has permanent exhibits on the life in the village in past times , but also on local art , notably paintings and paper cuts .
#Text=This museum showcases the history of hot-air balloons .
#Text=A highlight is the capsule Breitling Orbiter used by Bertrand Piccard to circumnavigate the globe in 1999 .
#Text=Hot-air balloon flights ( Ballon Château d'Œx ) , ☏ +41269242220 , ✉ info@ballonchateaudoex.ch .
#Text=See the Alps from a new perspective - from the basket of a hot-air balloon !
#Text=There are numerous take-off points and numerous pilots in the area , allowing you to ride the winds no matter their direction .
#Text=Numerous bridle paths wind between Rougemont through Château dŒx to Rossinière .
#Text=Meet at the Les Moulins to take a climb rain or shine .
#Text=Head to Bowling du Parc for a good time on the lanes .
#Text=The centre also offers tennis and ice skating .
#Text=With over 300km of marked paths , this regions offers some great opportunities to experience the great outdoors .
#Text=A walking map with 15 suggested itineraries , labelled with length and difficult , is available around town .
#Text=A wild adventure on the river Sarine .
#Text=Strap on your flippers and float down the river with your head bobbing on the water 's surface .
#Text=Suited into an isothermal outfit , you can walk and swim into some of the wildest gorges in the region .
#Text=Marked mountain biking tracks can be found all around the region .
#Text=The heated , olympic sized swimming pool at au Berceau is open from mid-May to early September .
#Text=There are plenty of opportunities for downhill and cross country skiing , even tobogganing .
#Text=A rather small ski area right in the village
#Text=Le Chalet , Route de la gare 2 , ☏ +41269246677 , ✉ lechalet-fromagerie@bluewin.ch . Sa - Th 08:30 – 18:00 , F 08:30 – 00:00 .
#Text=Has a cheese-making demonstration on some days from 10:30 – 12:30 .
#Text=Château-d'Œx has various hotels and traditional Swiss châlets for rent .
#Text=Camping - Au Berceau , Route des Mosses 18 , ☏ +41269246234 , fax : +41269242526 .
#Text=Youth hostel ( Auberge de Jeunesse ) , Route des Monnaires 67 , ☏ +41269246404 , fax : +41269245843 , ✉ chateau.d.oex@youthhostel.ch .
#Text=Restoski , Route des Mosses 104 , 1660 La Lécherette , ☏ +41269246259 , fax : +41269244163 .
#Text=Pension le Vieux Chalet , Route de la Frasse 57 , 1660 Château d'Oex , ☏ +41269246879 , fax : +41269244311 .
#Text=Hotel Valrose , Place de la Gare , Rougemont , ☏ +41269237777 , ✉ welcome@hotelvalrose.ch .
